Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the amount of gifts that Tim Kaine took compared to Bob McDonnell.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Bob McDonnell actually took more gifts and loans than Tim Kaine.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to prove that Tim Kaine took more gifts than Bob McDonnell.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that taking gifts is a problem without considering the legality and proper reporting of the gifts.
Understate: The claim understates the amount of gifts and loans that Bob McDonnell actually took.
